ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package frozen dinner rolls, thawed

cookingTips: Arrange thawed rolls in buttered baking dish without crowding too much
Simmer coconut sauce gently while rolls proof and bake
Pour hot sauce over warm baked rolls so they absorb liquid and soften
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This Hawaiian treat is quick and indulgent. Would you like guidance on finding quality coconut milk or tips for adjusting sweetness?
